SID:Element.SID:Attributes:
<SID:Attribute id="value" atype="lpc_flt" acomment="How much volume can this container hold?
Values are in cubic meters (m^3)
(1 cubic meter = 1000 liters = 264.2 gallons = ~five 55-gallon drums = ~1 long ton of water = 1.3 cubic yards = 35.31 cubic feet = 61,015 cubic inches)
(1 cubic foot = ~0.03 m^3; 6x6x6 inches = ~0.004 m^3; 1 gallon of water = ~0.004 m^3; 1 liter is 0.001 m^3; 1 cubic inch = ~0.0004 m^3)" areadonly="false" aquery="query_intrinsic_capacity"/>
